Cardcade

Placed 1st overall together with a partner in Mini Jam 104, a 72 hour Game Jam. Rated 1st in Entertainment, Use of Limitation, and Concept categories. Rated 2nd in Presentation. Produced the game using the Unity Game Engine. With cards, you can change the player‚Äôs gravity and rotate the level in order to reach a goal. Required to quickly learn how to use the Unity Game Engine during development.
